评论概述: Fit well, comfortable, washes well, interesting design
评论详情: This review is for the Rapidstreet Men Harajuku Streetwear T-Shirt Embryo Made Printed Aesthetic Graphic Tee Shirt. The Rapidstreet Men Harajuku Streetwear T-Shirt fit me well, it is comfortable, not too tight and not to lose, just right. I like the design of the two ladies who seems to blur into one another, with the different size lettering, very interesting and though provoking. I have worn the shirt many times, many times washed, holds up well, feels comfortable, no fading or peeling, strong collar. I actually think it looks better on me, then it does on the picture on the website.
It was a little big overall but i love the material, tad bit tight at the neck.

评论概述: Nice fit and size, but stiff and stuffy for cotton.
评论详情: Nice cotton shirt with distressed or washed out Black Dahlia Murder logo on the front, along with some other bands. Shirt is made from a pretty thick cotton which is stiff. It's gonna take a lot of laundry cycles to soften this bad boy. Otherwise nice shirt. TTS.

评论概述: Comfortable but it has a tight neck.
评论详情: We got this in a size medium. We got it for a boy who is 14, is 5' 8" and weighs about 135 lbs. It fits him just fine. However it has a very narrow neck. It stretches easily enough and isn't difficult to put on or take off your head. Despite being 100% cotton, it hasn't shrunk significantly. It is soft and comfortable. The neck tag isn't annoying or irritating. It is quite high price for T-shirt, but it is a nice shirt.
